bodhi-shell¶

Synopsis¶

bodhi-shell

Description¶

bodhi-shell is used to run a Python shell initialized with Bodhi models.

Options¶

--help

Show help text and exit.

--version

Show version and exit.

Help¶

If you find bugs in Bodhi (or in this man page), please feel free to file a bug report or a pull request:

https://github.com/fedora-infra/bodhi

Bodhi’s documentation is available online: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/docs
